column4: When i m trying to install ubuntu , i have a graphics problem ... (8.04) , can anyone help me ?
can u check your cable to monitor ?
can u try install text based ?
there should be option text install on livecd after it boots menu if i recall corectly
try boot livecd and check if it gives option for text based install ?
i dont know what parameter could he gave you :/
i can only sugest you try alternate cd  or try check for text based install on livecd option b4 u boot into livecd
np m8, glad u fixed it
sugest that u write that down :P
